Key Match Events: The game ended with a save for Walker Buehler, who had never saved a game before in his career
The Dodgers rallied for five runs in the fifth inning to tie the game
The Yankees blew a five-run lead
Pre-Game Insights: The game was anticipated as a close match between the two rival teams
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers' victory was seen as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
The Yankees' loss marked the end of their World Series and their season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was described as the craziest World Series clincher ever
The game included a no-hitter watch for Gerrit Cole that turned into a five-run inning for the Dodgers
The game featured three errors, a balk, and catcher's interference by the Yankees
Others: The game was played at Yankee Stadium
The Dodgers' starting pitcher, Jack Flaherty, got four outs in the game
Blake Treinen arrived on the mound in the sixth inning and fired 42 pitches
